h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: If it's your first time visiting, you'll have a boss to deal with before you can enter. But after this, you can go and activate the Temple Entrance Keeper's Shrine. Go right from the shrine and down to the building up ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
If it's your first time visiting, you'll have a boss to deal with before you can enter. But after this, you can go and activate the Temple Entrance Keeper's Shrine. Go right from the shrine and down to the building up ahead.
